amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide $5 million to increase language proficiency and workforce diversity in the intelligence community.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer $5 million from the Intelligence Community Management Account's general funding to its account for programs and scholarships to increase language proficiency and workforce diversity in the intelligence community.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reyes amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 221 (Roll no. 555).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Reyes.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Reyes amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 221 (Roll no. 555).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
